name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leigh Ann JONES, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leigh Ann JONES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C.J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ernest D. Preate, Jr., Dist. Atty., Scranton, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 956
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Leigh Ann JONES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 1982.
Decided Dec. 30, 1982.
John Mercuri, Moscow (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Ernest D. Preate, Jr., Dist. Atty., Scranton, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
